movies.title: Otello
movies.plot: Opera by Verdi, based on Shakespeare's play Othello. The jealous general Otello believes the lie that his wife Desdemona, is adulterous, strangles her and commits suicide.
movies.simplePlot: Opera by Verdi, based on Shakespeare's play Othello. The jealous general Otello believes the lie that his wife Desdemona, is adulterous, strangles her and commits suicide.

biography.bio: José Cura was born on December 5, 1962 in Rosario, Santa Fe, Argentina. He is an actor, known for Il trovatore (2002), La traviata (2000) and Otello (2006).
biography.name: José Cura

biography.bio: Lado Ataneli is an actor, known for Thaïs (2009), Otello (2006) and Pikovaia Dama/The Queen of Spade (2011).
biography.name: Lado Ataneli

biography.bio: Vittorio Grigolo was born on February 19, 1977 in Rome, Lazio, Italy. He is an actor, known for Rigoletto a Mantova (2010), Otello (2006) and Tosca (1990).
biography.name: Vittorio Grigolo

biography.bio: Vicenç Esteve is an actor, known for Otello (2006), Hérodiade (1985) and I puritani (2001).
biography.name: Vicenç Esteve

biography.bio: Giorgio Giuseppini is an actor, known for Macbeth (2015), Moïse et Pharaone (2003) and Aida (2006).
biography.name: Giorgio Giuseppini

biography.bio: Francisco Santiago is an actor, known for Anak dalita (1956), Otello (2006) and Verdi: Macbeth (2005).
biography.name: Francisco Santiago

biography.bio: Roberto Accurso is an actor, known for Cyrano de Bergerac (2008), Otello (2006) and La traviata: Melodramma in tre atti (2013).
biography.name: Roberto Accurso

biography.bio: Krassimira Stoyanova is an actress, known for Eugene Onegin (2013), Otello (2006) and La juive (2003).
biography.name: Krassimira Stoyanova

biography.bio: Ketevan Kemoklidze is an actress, known for Don Giovanni, naissance d'un opéra (2009), Otello (2006) and Thaïs (2009).
biography.name: Ketevan Kemoklidze

actors.actorName: Cor del Gran Teatre del Liceu

biography.bio: Cor del Gran Teatre del Liceu is known for his work on Les Contes d'Hoffmann/The Tales of Hoffmann (2013), Giulio Cesare (2004) and Hamlet, Ambroise Thomas (2004).
biography.name: Cor del Gran Teatre del Liceu

actors.actorName: Orquestra Simfònica del Gran Teatre del Liceu

biography.bio: Orquestra Simfònica del Gran Teatre del Liceu is known for his work on Carmen (2011), Giulio Cesare (2004) and Boris Godunov (2004).
biography.name: Orquestra Simfònica del Gran Teatre del Liceu

biography.placeOfBirth: L'Hospitalet de Llobregat, Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain
biography.bio: Antoni Ros-Marbà was born in 1937 in L'Hospitalet de Llobregat, Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain. He is known for his work on Bon cop de falç. La història de l'himne (2014), Victòria! La gran aventura d'un poble (1983) and Otello (2006).
biography.name: Antoni Ros-Marbà
